name: Namasu
description:
Time & Chiken Attack Action.
This game is development version beta 5.

<Story> 
The Oni suddenly came target. 
Run away from fox, but must attack chicken.

<Rule>
This game collect chicken points with time attack.
 1. Game over when Life lost.
 2. Game over when Time runs out.
 3. NPC will not die. Chicken will be die.

<How to>   （beta5 add tutorial）

ASDW: Character movement
Space: Jump
Shift: Walk or Dash mode change
Mouse: Screen movement
Left click: Attack

Esc：Close game screen

<etc>
I changed game to a browser version that can be played easily. If need exe version look to Download link.

The original story of this game is a comic with the Onix. The Itch.io seems to be able to post comic, so I would like to post it someday. Until then, please look the web site.

NutsMark
